feed.title: Braidpool: Proposal for a decentralised mining pool

entry.title: Braidpool: Proposal for a decentralised mining pool
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin developer mailing list, Billy Tetrud asked how a proposed decentralized mining protocol compares to Stratum v2. Dave responded with interest in the advantages of the new proposal over a centralized mining pool using BetterHash or StratumV2 with payouts made via LN. No other details were provided in the context. The email also contained a non-text attachment of a signature file.
